name: R5_v2_0174_for_R4B
title: Cross-version VS for R5.Hl7VSNatureOfServiceTestObservation for use in FHIR R4B
description: This cross-version ValueSet represents concepts from http://terminology.hl7.org/ValueSet/v2-0174|2.0.0 for use in FHIR R4B. Concepts not present here have direct `equivalent` mappings crossing all versions from R5 to R4B.

concept.display: Profile or battery consisting of many independent atomic observations (e.g., SMA12, electrolytes), usually done at one instrument on one specimen
Functional procedure that may consist of one or more interrelated measures (e.g., glucose tolerance test, creatinine clearance), usually done at different times and/or on different specimens
Atomic service/test/observation (test code or treatment code)

Superset-a set of batteries or procedures ordered under a single code unit but processed as separate batteries (e.g., routines = CBC, UA, electrolytes)

This set indicates that the code being described is used to order multiple service/test/observation b
Single observation calculated via a rule or formula from other independent observations (e.g., Alveolar-arterial ratio, cardiac output)

contains.display: Profile or battery consisting of many independent atomic observations (e.g., SMA12, electrolytes), usually done at one instrument on one specimen
Functional procedure that may consist of one or more interrelated measures (e.g., glucose tolerance test, creatinine clearance), usually done at different times and/or on different specimens
Atomic service/test/observation (test code or treatment code)

Superset-a set of batteries or procedures ordered under a single code unit but processed as separate batteries (e.g., routines = CBC, UA, electrolytes)

This set indicates that the code being described is used to order multiple service/test/observation b
Single observation calculated via a rule or formula from other independent observations (e.g., Alveolar-arterial ratio, cardiac output)
